definition: color printing using several overlaid images

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: Printing process in tension variety the scope may be small, the set print accuracy easily controlled.
sentences.chinese: 印刷過程中，張力變化範圍小，套印精度就容易控制。

sentences.english: Overprinting foils makes for truly eye-catching features at the point of sale.
sentences.chinese: 套印箔使真正意義上醒目在銷售點的功能。

sentences.english: Overprints, High reject rate, Large coldeviation.
sentences.chinese: 多次套印廢品率高，色彩偏差大。

sentences.english: The Methods stipulate that invoices should be chomatolographed with the manufacture-supervising seal for unified national invoices.
sentences.chinese: 辦法》規定，發票應當套印全國統一發票監製章。

sentences.english: The position of each station can be adjusted alone, in order to obtain good chromatography precision.
sentences.chinese: 各個工位可單獨調效位置，以獲得良好的套印精度。

sentences.english: High reject rate, Large color deviation.
sentences.chinese: 多次套印廢品率高，色彩偏差大。

sentences.english: Paper-feeding mechanism of printing press is the key part to ensure the accuracy in registration.
sentences.chinese: 印刷機遞紙機構是保證承印物套印準確的關鍵部件。

sentences.english: Overprints, High reject rate, Large color deviation.
sentences.chinese: 多次套印廢品率高，色彩偏差大。

sentences.english: In many cases special envelopes or overprinted postage stamps were used.
sentences.chinese: 在很多情況下，使用的是特殊信封和套印郵票。

sentences.english: The Methods stipulate that invoices should be chomatolographed with the manufacture-supervising seal for …
sentences.chinese: 《辦法》規定，發票應當套印全國統一發票監製章。
